meanings.definition: To make something more attractive or stylish.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys spiffying up her room with colorful decorations.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer is spiffying up the runway for the upcoming show.
meanings.sent3: After spiffying up the old car, it looked as good as new.
meanings.sent4: The artist spiffied up the dull painting with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: Spiffying the garden with fresh flowers made it a delightful sight.

meanings.definition: To improve the appearance or condition of something.
meanings.sent1: He is spiffying his resume to impress potential employers.
meanings.sent2: The chef is spiffying the dish with a sprinkle of herbs.
meanings.sent3: The magician spiffied up his act with a new trick.
meanings.sent4: The teacher spiffied up the lesson with interactive activities.
meanings.sent5: Spiffying the website's layout increased user engagement.
